Posts.Content: Jun 1, 2018 07:02PM Julia0804 wrote: I had my thyroid ablated by radiation in 2008 and haven't had any adjustments in the last 2 years. Last December I did 20 radiation treatments and my thyroid went from 2.3 (normal & in range) to 40.26, I was a complete zombie.
Posts.Title: Thyroid damaged by rads? tlfrank tlfrank
